column5: Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable vacation in our fully furnished, 1520 sq ft 3 bedroom/2 bath Hill Country cabin on 40 acres.   Having a Hill Country Wedding? This Hill Country Cabin is perfect for out of town guest.   Watch the sunset from the expansive front porch or balcony off the upstairs bedroom. Spend the day away at one of the many local wineries, visit some famous Texas swimming holes or just enjoy the peace and quiet.  There is 1.7 miles of dirt road to the property entrance.
column8: Texas Hill Country Retreat with Breathtaking Views
